definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_has_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:ErrorAdv</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:ErrorAdv</field><next><block type="entity_clear_inventory"/></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_clear_inventory"><next><block type="entity_allow_building"><value name="condition"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
